body.name: Phone Tripod, Goocong Flexible Tripod for Cell Phone with Cell Phone Mount Portable Camera Tripods for iPhone, Samsung Smartphone, Google Pixel, DSLR Canon, Nikon Camera
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 6 mins
features: 【Reliable Quality】: All three legs are made of high-density rubber-wrapped metal cores wound with 7 strands, which contributes to multiplied tenacity both inside and outside, so it will not break or crack after years of use. The larger aluminum alloy ball head with a knob lock can achieve a stronger load-bearing capacity (up to 3.3lbs) and provides high security for your phone/camera.

【A classic yet timeless octopus】: The flexible tripod can handle many unique angles that cannot be achieved with two hands and traditional straight-leg tripods. Its non-skid legs can tightly wrap around various objects, such as railings, fences, tree trunks, and benches, or stand steadily on desktops or uneven surfaces by adjusting the legs.

【More than 360°】: Only horizontal 360° rotation is absolutely not enough to capture the perfect angle. With our flexible tripod you can not only adjust the vertical angle to shoot up and down, and sto switch between portrait and landscape orientation. Ideal for selflie, traveling and video recording.

【Widely Applicable】: The standard screw on the ball head can be fully adapted to various types of DSLR, mirrorless and digital cameras. The width of the phone clip is 2.2inch-3.7inch, phones of different sizes can work well. In addition, two standard screw holes are set on both sides of the camera phone tripod for installation of a microphone, fill light or other accessories, which is very convenient.

【Accompany you to record every beautiful moment】: the lightweight and portable tripod is only 0.66 lb heavy and 11 inch long, can be easily put in your pocket, handbag, backpack for storage, travel and hiking. While traveling you can quickly use it any time you want to take beautiful photos, definitely a great companion for photography enthusiasts!
body.description: Products of reliable quality From the time of acceptance of the material and after the finished product is made, it undergoes two quality inspections to ensure a very high quality standard.The ball lock increases the locking strength to avoid loosening and sliding.The rubber on the outer layer of the legs has good water resistance and is easy to clean.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Goocong tripod for the beauty of every moment For taking more exquisite photos at your fingertips, Goocong's tripod helps to stabilize your camera/mobile phone and frame better.

High-quality flexible legs to solve the limitations of the position Octopus legs can be bent to adjust the center of gravity to maintain stability, or wrapped in some position to obtain distinctive angles that cannot be achieved by hand.

Bigger and Stronger Superior quality, better materials, and a larger ball head designed for greater safety and stability.Not only does it lock tighter, it helps you keep the angle better and stabler. Incredibly Flexible Legs Externally, the combination of high-density rubber material and wavy texture realizes non-slip and waterproof.Internally, the metal core made of 7 aluminum strips provides more than 3 times the toughness. 2 in 1 Clip Lay it flat, it's a camera holder with non-slip padsPut it upright, it's a extensile phone clipNo longer carrying a extra large and thick phone clip anymore when going outdoor.

Products of reliable quality From the time of acceptance of the material and after the finished product is made, it undergoes two quality inspections to ensure a very high quality standard.The ball lock increases the locking strength to avoid loosening and sliding.The rubber on the outer layer of the legs has good water resistance and is easy to clean. Parameter Weight: 10OZ Leg length: 7.87 Inch Load capacity: 3.3 Ibs Phone clip rang: 2.2 - 3.7 Inch Compatibility: mobile phone and camera

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this one for the flexible legs. It's really nice and def worth the price. Iay buy a second for my other camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Sturdy Little Tripod
reviews.reviewText: I am a private investigator who does a lot of surveillance. I am always looking for new products to do a better job at capturing quality video. It easily supports a Panasonic HC-V180 camcorder. The tripod is very well constructed and could accommodate an even larger camera. However, it is a little too big for use inside my vehicle, an SUV, and the legs are not flexible enough to meet my needs. As seen in the photos, I had a little trouble tightly securing them around the steering wheel. For my use, thinner more flexible legs are preferrable. I have a mid-sized SUV and the tripod is a bit too tall to set up on the dash. I still playing around with it, so I may find one or more situations where nothing can take its place. Overall, it is a great little tripod for "normal use." Great for setting up on uneven surfaces and the camera mounting base is adjustable to ensure you get the right angle on your subject matter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: So easy to use! Makes doing what I love so much easier! You need this tripod!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best little tripod so far
reviews.reviewText: Had several similar tripods, a few broke, a few became rigid.I bought this tripod because it says it has this multi metal strand feature in its legs.Multi-strand means each strand is thinner, more flexible, and combined, they don't get broken when bent.Considering the phone holder, swivel base, and other small parts each would cost a few bucks, the whole tripod for less than $15 is really a steal. With its quality, I would have paid $30, but no more than $30, though.Wish other photo gears were as good as this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Useful for making YouTube videos
reviews.reviewText: It is very versatile and portable. I was very impressed with how sturdy it is; that it can hold even a standard 200 mm SLR camera without tipping over. I like how the legs can wrap around an object - see the photo of it attached to a tree. I like that it can hold a smartphone.The only con I observe is that a smartphone takes a little bit of strength to fit in because it uses a spring to hold it, and also it if you wanted the camera or phone to be at the level of the table of the subject then it is it not possible because of the offset of its tripod.I highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Serves its purpose
reviews.reviewText: This tripod was purchased to hold an electronic game call off the ground. It does that well, plus with the flexible legs it can be hung from tree limbs. Very good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality product. Much more useful than competitors.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this one after owning one of the cheaper ones for about a month before the legs snapped off. This one is great. Very sturdy, nice materials, clean look, super versatile. Didn’t see a remote though.

Very sturdy and well made. Light-weight. I got this to have an alternative way to hold my iPhone, sitting and lying down. It is working perfectly for me and I’m no longer constantly looking down to read the iPhone. It complete relieves any finger, hand or wrist fatigue from holding the phone when playing games. It sits easily anywhere (including on my chest when Im laying on my back) and has no problem hanging onto things and finally, is MORE VISIBLE. I’m not losing my iPhone anymore!As soon as I get home I attach my phone to this tripod. I highly recommend this product.

Un tripode que no defrauda. Sólido y a su vez maleable para sujetarlo en cualquier lugar. Usado en salidas a la montaña, ofrece grandes resultados. Lo único a destacar como pero es que podría llevar un mando a distancia

reviews.reviewTitle: Oltre le Aspettative: Tra Flessibilità & Stabilità
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Ho avuto modo di testare diversi treppiedi e sino ad ora nessuno mi aveva particolarmente soddisfatto, incuriosito dal prezzo, già basso di suo e grazie ad un'ulteriore sconto ho deciso di comprare questo modello della Goocong e sono rimasto molto contento.PACKAGING:Confezione molto minimal, dritta al sodo, senza fronzoli1pz Treppiede1pz Manuale in inglese (ma facilmente comprensibile dato che ha solo immagini)PRO- Ottimi materiali, si sente veramente bene al tatto, da una buona sensazione di stabilitá- La flessibilitá del treppiede è veramente ottima, permette di avvolgerlo veramente ovunque senza preoccupazioni (io consiglierei un utilizzo cosí solo con Smartphone o Action cam)- Stabilitá sorprendente nonostante la sua flessibilitá, garantendo immagini nitide-Compatibilitá universale: Ho provato ad utilizzarlo su vari dispositivi (Samsung, Apple,Xiaomi, Oppo e GoPro e fotocamera Canon)Design- Leggero e Portatile: Il treppiede è facile e comodo da trasportare. Viaggiando spesso l'ho trovato veramente pratico durante i vari spostamenti- Rivestimento delle Gambe: Il rivestimento delle tre gambe flessibili non solo è piacevole al tatto ma offre anche un'eccellente aderenza sulle superfici- Connettività Versatile per Accessori: Le due filettature da 1/4 posizionate ai lati della base della testa si sono dimostrate molto comode al momento di collegare accessori aggiuntivi (microfoni o o piccole luci)- Sicurezza sfera ben fatta: È possibile stringerlo a piacimento e regolarlo tirando verso l'esterno la levetta di blocco, consentendo di aumentare ulteriormente la forza stringente. Una volta serrato, il treppiede non non si smuove- A questo prezzo non esistono competitor: Circa 13€ per un treppiedi cosí é un'ottimo rapporto qualitá/prezzo, li vale tutti fino all'ultimo centesimoCONTRO:- Come si evince dalle foto il pacco é arrivato leggermente danneggiato- Testa del Treppiede Non Sostituibile: La testa del treppiede non è sostituibile. Essendo la testa integrata è un elemento fisso è consigliabile valutare attentamente se questa limitazione possa influire sulle proprie esigenze - Limitazione di Peso: Per quanto é adatto a smartphone e fotocamere compatte, ho la sensazione che potrebbe presentare difficoltà con dispositivi più pesanti come reflex professionali. - A voler essere pignoli (dato che qualcuno li usa e li trova pratici) manca di telecomandino a volte incluso con altri treppiedi dello stesso tipoCONCLUSIONISicuramente un'ottimo prodotto, molto meglio di altri competitor.Per quelle che sono le mie esigenze mi ha veramente soddisfatto, soprattutto visto il prezzo che ho pagato (solo 13,67€) considero che vale veramente comprarlo, 5 stelle meritate!

Vielseitiges und funktionales Stativ für Mobiltelefon und leichtere Kameras.Habe es z.B. als Stativ am Fahrradlenker mit einem iPhone „missbraucht“ und sehr gute Ergebnisse erzielt. Fazit: empfehlenswert.

Le fixateur pour téléphone se vise sur le trépied. Ce qui fait que lorsque l'on oriente le téléphone, on peut sans le vouloir dévisser le porte téléphone, ce qui rend l'orientation de la camera très agaçant. Egalement ce trépied n'est pas conçu pour pouvoir filmer comme un travail manuel (le bras n'a pas cette mobilité et le trépied et déséquilibrer par le poids du téléphone). Je ne recommande pas ce produit.
